concept.title: Who We Are
concept.shortdesc: DITA Open Toolkit is maintained and developed by a team of volunteer developers.

conbody.p: The toolkit was originally developed within IBM, but was contributed to SourceForge in 2005 and has been updated significantly since that time.

ul.li: Robert D Anderson (IBM) - Architect and current project lead, frequent developer and doc updator, primary maintainer of this set of Wiki pages
Jason (Jian Le Shen, IBM) - Primary developer within IBM
Eric Sirois (IBM) - contributor for several chunks of Eclipse and indexing related code
Jarno Elovirta (Citec Group) - Java and XSLT developer
Aryeh Sanders and Reuven Weiser (Suite Solutions) - responsible for PDF output using the PDF2 transform
Stephen Zhang (IBM) - Primary developer through the first several years of the toolkit
Chris Wong - original contributor of the PDF2 plugin
Deborah Pickett (Moldflow) - Frequent developer and contributor
Eliot Kimber (Really Strategies, Inc) - DTD and XML Schema caching
Dick Johnson and Anna van Raaphorst (VR Communcations, Inc) - Original contributors of the DITA User Guide
